root.name: Storm
root.description: System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 and 8 (32 or 64)Processor: Dual Core 2 GHzMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: Memory 256 Mb, ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT or NVIDIA GeForce 7900 GTX or more recent modelDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 1300 MB HD spaceRecommendedOS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 and 8 (32 or 64)Processor: Dual Core 2 GHzMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: Memory 512 Mb, ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT or NVIDIA GeForce 7900 GTX or more recent modelDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 1300 MB HD space
